Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2019 06:52PM urbanfarm wrote: hi msrukia! I hope you are well. I too am waiting for a biopsy. Been a week and my mind and body is so tired from all the worrisome. I had my annual mammogram a few weeks ago and then was told I needed a breast ultrasound. Then the radiologist came in and said he saw a small spot and wants to make sure. So I’m scheduled for a biopsy. I am truely scared so I called my dr and asked her opinion on the reading. She said the pea size spot is small but solid. That’s why he wants to check it. It doesn’t have any blood flow to it. Just a spot about 7mm. So she said don’t worry too much. If it is cancer, it’s good it’s small. I’m 47 and in menopause. I’m hoping it’s nothing.
Posts.Title: Rough Waiting Day MsRukia MsRukia

Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2019 06:56AM urbanfarm wrote: hi!! I as well am waiting on a biopsy now. Radiologist said he saw a small spot and was concerned because of its rough edges. I cried and have been a wreck since Friday. Have to wait a week for biopsy. I’m in menopause so hoping it’s related. I’m gonna call tomorrow and see if they can get me in sooner.
Posts.Title: Ultrasound suspicious: biopsy recommended, cledbetter17 DogMomRunner
